TopicTitle: landing gear collision/hit boxes seems to shift after takeoff.

Articles.Content: Landing gear hitboxes seem to shift/mutate after take off.  Sometimes this seems to result in twisted landing gear model itself.  This ususally causes the landing gear to not contact the ground evenly.  The direction of friction/drag seems to often shift as well.  Usually after landing its mostly not possible to take off again as the plane will not track straight on the ground.  Sometimes at least one of the gear seem to be semi dislodged, exhibiting a vibration, while the other gear seem stable.  Not sure if its the cycling up/down of the landing gear or the landing gear leaving the ground initially (edited)
